thread.section_title: Arbor City Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great stay!
thread.title_full: Great stay! - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jessica T
title: Great stay!
text: Loved it. Been to the Hyde Park Arbor 3 years ago, where I liked the roomdesign more (and the secret sweets ;-)), but the location of this hotel is much better - if you like East London (what we definetely do!). The staff was really nice, overall Erik, who checked us in and gave us a room with a beautiful view, although we arrived really late. The room was clean, the bed comfortable. On the weekend it could get a bit noisy, but we like the city's hustle and bustle, so this was ok for us. Underground 2 min walk. We're definetely coming back asap :-).
